Russian teachers often sing the blues
27) a . John-ga [Mary-ga sono hon-o katta to] omotteiru
John-Nom Mary-Nom that book-Acc bought that thinks
'John thinks that Mary bought the book.'
27) a . John-ga [Mary-ga sono hon-o katta to] omotteiru
John-Nom Mary-Nom that book-Acc bought that thinks
'John thinks that Mary bought the book.'
a . John-ga [Mary-ga sono hon-o katta to] omotteiru

John thinks that Mary bought the book.
b. John-ga [Bill-ga [Mary-ga nani-o katta to] itta ka] sitteiru
John-Nom Bill-Nom Mary-Nom what-Acc bought that said Q knows
'John knows what Bill said that Mary bought.'
